titles.title: To Rescue a Sinner Like me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: TO RESCUE A SINNER LIKE ME

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I don’t understand how a God so divine

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Could lower Himself to a live such as mine

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And consider me worth every minute of time

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: To rescue a sinner like me

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: When I think of my Saviour alone on the cross

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: I know without Him that my life would be lost

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: If He had not been willing to suffer the cost

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: To rescue a sinner like me Lord

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: He abandoned His throne and His kingdom above

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: My mind is so limited I cannot see

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: The reason He died and arose just for me

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: So unworthy was I yet He came willingly

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: To rescue a sinner as worthless as I

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: And give me a reason to sing

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: It’s so hard to believe but it happened to me
